staking.unstakeDescription: Staked shares will be linearly released block by block. Users can withdraw unlocked portions at any time while continuing to earn returns on the remaining shares.
staking.unstakeInfo: You can unstake released staking shares at any time. If there's still staking, these funds will continue to generate rebase rewards.
staking.claimDescription: Claim your staking rewards and reward bonuses. Rewards will enter the cooling pool.
staking.recordsDescription: You can view your staking records here.
staking.noRecords: This address has no staked tokens. You can stake now and earn daily rewards.
staking.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet address to view detailed records
staking.calculatorDescription: You can simulate and calculate returns from long-term staking.
staking.invite_not_active: Your account needs to bind a referrer address
staking.stake_tip: You can deposit or unstake at any time, no lock period, rebase rewards distributed every 12 hours
staking.noData: This address has no staked tokens

lockedStaking.title: Locked Staking
lockedStaking.alertDescription: Locked staking incentivizes users to extend staking periods through rebase reward bonuses, with bonus amounts proportional to staking duration.
lockedStaking.unstakeDescription: Staking shares will be released linearly by blocks. Users can withdraw unlocked shares at any time while continuing to earn returns on remaining shares.
lockedStaking.unstakeInfo: You can unstake released staking amounts at any time. If there's still staking, these funds will continue to generate block rewards.
lockedStaking.calculatorDescription: You can simulate and calculate returns from locked staking.
lockedStaking.claimInfo: You can claim rebase rewards at any time. If unclaimed, these rewards will automatically compound and continue generating additional rebase rewards.

dao.matrix_bonus_description: Matrix mechanism through up-down linkage, automatically takes commission from up and down ten generations of Rebase rewards daily
dao.evangelist_bonus_description: After becoming a V-level member, as long as there are V-level members in the evangelism network, you can permanently receive 2% commission from their evangelism bonus, penetrating up to 10 layers.
dao.super_bonus_description: In the evangelism network, as long as there are V-level members in the structure, you will receive 2% commission from their evangelism bonus, penetrating up to 10 layers, permanently effective.
dao.referral_bonus_description: Invite friends to participate in bond purchases or stake for 180 or 360 days to receive 5% commission bonus.
dao.max_bonus_info: Your bonus has reached the maximum claimable amount. Increase your personal Position to raise the upper limit of total bonus you can receive.
dao.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet address to view detailed records
dao.noRecords: This address has no evangelism bonus related transaction records.
dao.superNoRecords: This address has no Surpass bonus related transaction records.
dao.referralNoRecords: This address has no referral bonus related transaction records.

noLockedStaking.title: No-Lock Staking
noLockedStaking.alertDescription: You can deposit or unstake at any time, no lock period, rebase rewards distributed every 12 hours
noLockedStaking.unstakeDescription: You can unstake at any time, partially or fully withdraw your staking shares
noLockedStaking.unstakeInfo: After completing staking, your staking shares will enter a 24-hour cooling period. After the cooling time ends, staking shares can be released.
noLockedStaking.unstakeDisabledInfo: Before unstaking, you need to release this asset first.\nThe system will automatically release unfrozen assets when you initiate new staking.\nPlease note that only after successfully releasing this asset can you claim the rebase rewards generated by this staking share.
noLockedStaking.calculatorDescription: You can simulate and calculate returns from no-lock staking.
noLockedStaking.claimInfo: You can claim accumulated rewards at any time. After claiming, rewards will be sent to the cooling pool.
noLockedStaking.onOly: You currently have no OLY to unstake
noLockedStaking.cant_unclock: Staking lock period phase, cannot unstake

swap.title: Swap
swap.alertDescription: Search for the best price, including gas fees and swap fees. One-click execution.
swap.searchBestPrice: Search for the best price, including gas fees and swap fees. One-click execution.

turbine.title: Turbine
turbine.alertDescription: The Turbine Pool is a yield acceleration and management platform built on smart contracts, an important component of the OLYONE ecosystem. Cooling assets will be transferred to the Turbine Pool for secondary value empowerment, and users can claim yields through decentralized exchange (Swap) trading. It adopts an innovative liquidity conversion mechanism, ensuring fairness and efficiency through AMM algorithms, optimizing yield claiming and increasing liquidity depth.
turbine.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet address to view detailed records
turbine.noRecords: This address has no turbine-related transaction records.

toast.confirm_in_wallet: Please confirm transaction in your wallet...

community.title: Community
community.protocolDescription: OLY ONE is a future-oriented decentralized finance (DeFi 3.0) protocol, jointly initiated, collaboratively built and governed by communities from multiple countries worldwide, aiming to create a sustainable, transparent and highly secure DeFi ecosystem, promoting global users to truly realize the value consensus of decentralized finance. Don't miss out!

step1.title: Deposit Assets
step1.description: Stake OLY to the platform or use USDT to purchase bonds to start earning basic yields. Minimum $100 share to start.

step2.title: Refer Friends
step2.description: Invite friends to register and complete staking through your invitation link, both you and your friends can receive additional rewards.

step3.title: Create Community
step3.description: Create your own staking community, attract more members to join, or join high-activity communities. The platform will distribute additional rewards based on community locked amounts.

community.inviteFriends: Invite Friends, Enjoy 5 Major Revenue Systems
community.referralBenefits: Successfully refer friends to participate, unlock direct commission, 10-Layers matrix rewards, community evangelism rewards, global dividend rights and Surpass rewards, multiple revenue stacking, continuous passive income!
community.notData: This address has no referral-related records

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.analytics_description: Through visualization charts, deeply analyze data trends, transforming complex data into clear decision-making basis.

coolingPool.title: Cooling Pool
coolingPool.description: The Cooling Pool is a yield management system built on smart contracts within the OLYONE ecosystem, responsible for the orderly release of yields generated by users through staking, bonds and other incentive activities. All yields, once claimed, will enter the cooling pool and be released linearly by blocks according to user-set release periods. The system will implement tiered tax policies based on release periods. This mechanism ensures user asset flexibility while effectively maintaining market stability and avoiding short-term liquidity shocks.
coolingPool.walletNotConnected: Please connect your wallet address to view detailed records
coolingPool.noRecords: This address has no cooling pool related transaction records.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Through dynamic multi-dimensional data visualization, real-time tracking of key metrics—including asset allocation, community analysis, performance growth and reward details—all in one intuitive interface.
